name: SANTA vs ROBOTS - fan made
description:
Santa vs Robots was originally made by @theChAOTiC. I liked the premise so I made my own version!

-- LEFT & RIGHT: drive Santa's uni-motor-cycle -- UP & DOWN: aim finger gun up & down -- Z: jump --- X: shoot (watch out for the recoil) -- Hit multiple robots without taking damage to build up a combo. Reach +10 to enter POWERUP mode!!
